name: Cheap o’clock
description:
Cheap o’clock is a Game made for One Minute Game Jam, in which you have a 5-day limit and you have to create a game that has 1 minute of gameplay! This was all I can do hope you enjoy it!

Goal: a total of 6 randomly generated levels and trying to complete them in under 60 seconds. 

Gameplay: 

- AD/ right left

- W/ jump

- Left Arrow Right Arrow/ Gravity Change

Theme: Colorful

The game doesn't include many colors but after each level you complete, you paint your dark wall behind!
